name: Alvin Brown
description: I enjoy life to the fullest from simple pleasures to the finer things. I work long hours but at the same time I make room in my life for working out, spontaneous fun and travel, and that special woman. My friends and family are an important part of my life as well. I’m very romantic and attentive. I’m really a nice guy, the exception to the rule…no…really! I’ve been told – all my girlfriends (women friends tell me so. They also tell me I make them laugh (not at me, but because I’m funny). I am passionate and sensual, also honest and sensitive-I have feelings and I can identify them. I enjoy travel and outdoor activities (snow skiing, scuba diving, mountain biking, rollerblading, etc.), but also enjoy hanging out at home spooning (forking and watching DVD’s with a bottle of good merlot and a fine woman.
